---
template: config-yaml
type: configuration
variables:
  - project-name: Project name
  - project-description: Project description
  - timestamp: Generation timestamp
---

# Config YAML Template

Generate `documentation/config.yaml` using this structure:

```yaml
# documentation/config.yaml
# Project documentation configuration
# Generated by /x:setup on {{timestamp}}

version: 1

project:
  name: "{{project-name}}"
  description: "{{project-description}}"

# Stack configuration
# Auto-detected and confirmed by user
stacks:
  - name: primary
    path: /
    framework: {{stack-framework}}
    version: "{{stack-version}}"
    database: {{stack-database}}
    orm: {{stack-orm}}
    technologies:
      - {{technology-1}}
      - {{technology-2}}
    detected: true
    confirmed: true

# For monorepos, add multiple stacks:
# stacks:
#   - name: frontend
#     path: /apps/web
#     framework: nextjs
#     ...
#   - name: backend
#     path: /apps/api
#     framework: go-gin
#     ...

# Selected documentation sections
sections:
  - domain
  - development
  - implementation
  - milestones
  - reference

# Selected reference documents (AI-enhancement)
reference_docs:
  - conventions
  - patterns
  - glossary

settings:
  refresh_interval: 7d
  offline_fallback: true
  auto_navigation: true

generated: "{{timestamp}}"
```

## Variable Substitution

| Variable | Source | Example |
|----------|--------|---------|
| `{{project-name}}` | package.json name, go.mod module, or folder | "my-project" |
| `{{project-description}}` | package.json description or empty | "A web application" |
| `{{timestamp}}` | Current ISO timestamp | "2025-11-26T10:30:00Z" |
| `{{stack-framework}}` | Auto-detected framework | "nextjs" |
| `{{stack-version}}` | Framework version | "14.x" |
| `{{stack-database}}` | Detected database | "postgresql" |
| `{{stack-orm}}` | Detected ORM | "prisma" |
| `{{technology-N}}` | Additional technologies | "tailwind" |
